<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Discordant Voice](/Feats.aspx?ID=4634) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[_Courageous Anthem_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763)

</column>

---

Your courageous anthem lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies’ attacks with powerful sonic reverberations. While your allies are affected by your courageous anthem, their weapon Strikes and unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d6 sonic damage.
name: Discordant Voice
